title: Is our claim to Earth a manifestation or a clear destiny? - Quora

response.answer_text: “Manifest Destiny”? Oh, please don't go their! We aren't even pisspoor stewards of this rock! Religious zealots actually advocate the destruction of Earth with everyone on it! We can't even claim our lives as our own. If we could we wouldn't be dropping like flys! My illerate native Apache stepfather replied to a question about why he didn't want to own land. “No one can ever own the land. It is the Earth that we get our life from. It is the Earth that will take us back when we die.” I was only seven at the time, but to this day, It remains one of the most profound truths I've ever heard.
